useCase.name: Manage Missing Documents
useCase.description: Allow staff to identify and handle missing user documents

preconditions.precondition: The system must have missing document information

useCase.trigger: User identifies missing documents on the application detail page

mainSequence.step: Application Detail Page fetches missing documents
Backend Server queries and receives missing documents from the Database
Backend Server notifies Notification System about the missing documents
Backend Server confirms notifications sent to the Application Detail Page
Application Detail Page displays confirmation to the Staff
